val: The Soar is a text to audio conversor. A tool to help students, workers with a big quantity of texts to read, and anyone that need or prefer to listen than to read a text. My work in this job started with the tool concept. We, from Umb√∫, had need this tool, then we developed it. I designed the logo, I projected the interactions with team since wireframes until the screens; and I analyzed the users for the new functionalities. Oh, I'm social media poster too.
